text: فَإِمَّا تَثۡقَفَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡبِ فَشَرِّدۡ بِهِم مَّنۡ خَلۡفَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

translation.en: So if you, [O Muhammad], gain dominance over them in war, disperse by [means of] them those behind them that perhaps they will be reminded
translation.id: Jika engkau (Muhammad) mengungguli mereka dalam peperangan, maka cerai-beraikanlah orang-orang yang di belakang mereka dengan (menumpas) mereka, agar mereka mengambil pelajaran
